Name: FULFILLMENT
About the game: Welcome to JOB! Do you have what it takes to increase Shareholder Value üìà? Are you obsessed with Customer Satisfaction üíÅüèª? Can you lift things üì¶? Apply Now and climb to the top of the Company Scoreboard! Remember: Company Loves You! Fulfillment is a short, social-commentary game about working at a fulfillment center. Each day you will tackle an increasingly complex set of rules and restrictions, trying to make enough to afford rent and basic necessities. It's meant to be a small, bite-size taste of the full experience in this line of work - a single playthough takes only about 20 minutes (provided you make it all the way to the end). The game is and will always be 100% free without any micro-transaction!
